results.title: The Electro-magnet
results.creator_credit: Harry Dance, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
results.brief_description: The principles and application of the electro-magnet, production of magnetic fields by simple experiments; effect of introducing iron cores; retention of magnetism by a steel core; use of electro-magnets in telephone receivers and telephone exchanges; a “self-starter” of a motor vehicle leads on to consideration of AC and DC motors.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Harry Dance, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
results.description: The principles and application of the electro-magnet, production of magnetic fields by simple experiments; effect of introducing iron cores; retention of magnetism by a steel core; use of electro-magnets in telephone receivers and telephone exchanges; a “self-starter” of a motor vehicle leads on to consideration of AC and DC motors.

results.title: Electricity: generation and distribution
results.brief_description: Episode 6 of the series “Is this job for me” on the electricity supply industry. The jobs in the industry are shown by tracing the apprenticeships of two boys who went to the same school; one who enters the generating side and the other the distribution side of industry.
results.description: Episode 6 of the series “Is this job for me” on the electricity supply industry. The jobs in the industry are shown by tracing the apprenticeships of two boys who went to the same school; one who enters the generating side and the other the distribution side of industry.

results.title: Electricity from chemicals
results.brief_description: Explains chemical reactions which produce electric current in a simplified electric cell. Discusses dry cell, nickel-cadmium and lead storage batteries. Introduces such terms as ion, charge and electrode. Suitable for upper secondary level.
results.description: Explains chemical reactions which produce electric current in a simplified electric cell. Discusses dry cell, nickel-cadmium and lead storage batteries. Introduces such terms as ion, charge and electrode. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Electricity and movement
results.creator_credit: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
results.brief_description: The basic principles of the electric motor. Opens with an account of the properties of magnets. Compares the action of permanent magnets and electro-magnets. An electro-magnet is used to work an electric bell. An electro-magnet is then adapted so that it turns on an axle and, in this way, the development of a simple electric motor is demonstrated.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
results.description: The basic principles of the electric motor. Opens with an account of the properties of magnets. Compares the action of permanent magnets and electro-magnets. An electro-magnet is used to work an electric bell. An electro-magnet is then adapted so that it turns on an axle and, in this way, the development of a simple electric motor is demonstrated.

results.title: Electricity and light
results.creator_credit: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
results.brief_description: Explains how electrical energy is transformed into light by three methods - the filament lamp, the arc lamp, and the discharge tube. The film considers each type detail.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Durst, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park

results.title: Electricity and heat
results.creator_credit: Langton Gould-Marks, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
results.brief_description: The heating effect of an electric current is shown to be a clue to agitation of the aubital electrons; the difference between series and modern applications of electric heating are demonstrated.

results.title: Squirrel-cage rotor principles
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Electrical work: electrical machinery”.
Laws of magnetism and induced electromagnetic fields.; electric flow in squirrel-cage rotor setting up magnetic poles which create torque; construction of squirrel-cage rotors.

results.title: An Electric talking picture
results.brief_description: An animated energy conservation film which is built around a wasteful young user of electricity and a wise old man who points out the folly of wasting electricity. Narrated by the comedy team of Bob and Ray
